title: One Mighty kro; One Giant Leap for Kubernetes Resource Orchestration
author: Christina Andonov; Petro Kashlikov
description: By providing a configuration-based framework that eliminates the need for custom code, kro makes complex resource orchestration accessible.
cntitle: Kro 威力初显；Kubernetes 资源编排的巨大飞跃
cndescription: kro 提供了一个基于配置的框架，无需自定义代码，从而使复杂资源编排变得易于访问。
